A. Submit for approval on or before June 30, 1963*
1* Preliminary drafts of the first thirteen (13) inter¬
mediate level scripts, (Article I-A)
2* Eight (8) of the Analysis-commentaries. (Article I-B)
B* Submit for approval on or before April 30, 1964:
1, The complete series of thirty-nine (39) intermediate
scripts in final form and on stencils. (Article I-A)
2. The remaining five (5) analysis-commentaries in final
Witten form. (Article I-B)
C. Submit for approval on or before June 1, 1964*
1. Twenty-six (26) units, in final form and on stencils,
of the text of the listener’s aid and study guide.
(Article I-C)
2. Thirteen (13) units, in final fora and on stencils, of
the text of the listener’s aid and study guide.
(Article 14))
D. It is understood and agreed that the delivery schedule set
forth above may be flexible and subject to revision upon
determination by the AR/CO that such revisions are reasonable
and in the interest of the Government.
3* Article VI, Paragraph A.3* Payment, Is deleted in its entirety and
the following substituted therefor s
A.3. 3rd Payment - $^,000.00 . . Upon approval and acceptance of
materials under Article V-C, as amended,
4. Article VI, Paragraph A.4, Payment, is deleted in its entirety.
